title: 2 arrested over attack on July Rebels member
body: Police conducted raids in different areas of the capital to identify and arrest those involved Dhaka Metropolitan Police (DMP) have arrested two people in connection with the attack on Mohammad Rezwan, a member of an organisation known as July Rebels. The arrestees, Masum and Fahim Khan, were detained during a raid in the capitalâ€™s Dakshin Khan area at around 5:30am on Sunday, DMP Media Centre Deputy Commissioner Talebur Rahman confirmed. According to police, Mohammad Rezwan was attacked in Uttara Sector 6 at around 7:30pm on Saturday. He sustained injuries in the incident and was taken to a nearby private hospital, where he received treatment. Talebur Rahman said a case has been filed in connection with the attack. He added that police conducted raids in different areas of the capital to identify and arrest those involved, leading to the arrests early Sunday morning.
